sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2010/L.20), the SBSTA, inter alia : welcomes engagement of a wide range of organizations in NWP implementation and requests the Secretariat to continue to further engage relevant organizations; agrees to continue the review of the NWP and complete this by SBSTA 34; agrees to continue activities under the NWP, while the review is under way; and invites parties and organizations to provide views and information on progress made and gaps, as well as views on new activities to achieve the objective of the NWP, to inform the review, by 28 March 2011.
